DataElement.preferredName: Prostate Biochemical Progression Prediction Probability Nomogram Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Nomogram group code based on Kattan nomogram-predicted biochemical progression-free survival probability at 5 years after surgery.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: related to a measure forecasting the expectation for future biochemical evidence (e.g., blood) showing advancement of prostate gland cancer based on complex scientific algorithms (many datapoints).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A gland in the male reproductive system just below the bladder. It surrounds part of the urethra, the canal that empties the bladder. It produces a fluid that forms part of semen. (NCI-GLOSS):Biochemical; of or relating to biochemistry; involving chemical processes in living organisms.:Progression; advancement in extent or severity.

Concepts.definition: The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system. It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra. The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen.
Of or relating to biochemistry; involving chemical processes in living organisms.
Progression; advancement in extent or severity.

Property.preferredDefinition: An extrapolation of given data into the future.:A measure of the expectation of the occurrence of a particular event.

Concepts.definition: An extrapolation of given data into the future.
A measure of the expectation of the occurrence of a particular event.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: new version updated for new DEC use; ISO compliance

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Group Code corresponding to range of survival probability values predicted by a nomogram calculator.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A graphical calculating device or a two-dimensional diagram designed to allow the approximate graphical computation of a function.: Any number of entities (members) considered as a unit.: A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.
